description:
Keep your chain fresh and clean with this compact cleaner. A clean chain means less wear and tear on your drivetrain, so your components last longer and you get to ride more.

  • 120 contact points get all your chain’s nooks and crannies
  • Includes 75ml of concentrated drivetrain cleaner
  • 1-hand design allows you to pump the cleaner while holding the device
  • Dual reservoir keeps the dirty cleaner away from your newly cleaned chain
  • Single clip system attaches quickly
name: Muc-Off X3 Chain Cleaning Kit
